page.title: 13FIRE STATION
page.content: The{Fire Station}is opposite the surgery in Lower Lane. It has one appliance (a Dennis make) and{seven {firemen.}The station is a retained fire station which means{part time. The firemen are called by an eletronic signal which makes a bleeping noise. The fire engine can take{six personnel at a time. It has one ladder, cutting equipment for crash victims and lots of hoses. The fire station has a tower for practising putting out fires. They practise every Tuesday night. It is quite often called out. All seven people, who{must live within one mile of the station, are called but only the first six to get there are accept- ed. The ranks in Bishops Waltham are: Sub Oficer, First in Command, Leading Fire man, Second in Command; the rest are Privates.
